item.title: Common Variables Into One Variable
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

Have you ever wanted to just have one variable which could be all types of variables?
Then this might be for you.

[scar]program CommonVars;

Type
Common = Record
Str : String;
Ext : Extended;
Bool : Boolean;
Byte : Byte;
Char : Char;
Int : Integer;
end;

Var
I: Common;

begin
I.Int := 1890;
I.Str := IntToStr(I.Int);
I.Bool := True;
I.Byte := 67;
I.Char := ‘h’;
I.Ext := 0.1;
writeln(I.Str);
end.[/scar]

Pretty Nifty

Read full topic
